title: Riot Girl Tristana
body:
So, I know this is pretty late but, after Tris's new splash art riot girl tristana looks so outdated.

All you have to do is change the hair colour :o

replies.body: It would look kind of weird, considering the amount of red in the new splash {{champion:18}}  Maybe could change the riot girl splash art to the [Chinese splash](http://lolwp.com/tristana/tristana_splash_11/) ?
